info.summary:
Olaf Kath works as a Dr. Olaf Kath (CEO) Dr. Olaf Kath did his PhD in 2001 at the Humboldt-Universität in Berlin, at the institute for computer sciences. From 2001 on, he is engaged in the introduction of model based technologies and methodologies into customer processes. In January 2006, Dr. Kath became Chief Executive Officer of ikv++ technologies ag in Humboldt-University of Berlin|Department of Computer Science, and his\her h-index is 4, g-index is 6.
